GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: Creates a new topic with a unique slug and description.

201.description: Returns the newly created topic object.

400.description: Returns an error message for invalid or missing fields.

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

queryDescriptions.author: Filter articles by the username of the author
queryDescriptions.sort_by: Sort articles by a valid column. Defaults to 'created_at'. Valid columns: article_id, title, author, body, topic, created_at, votes, comment_count
queryDescriptions.order: Specify 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending order. Defaults to 'desc'

exampleQueries.description: Sort articles by created_at in ascending order
Sort articles by votes in descending order
Filter articles by the topic 'cooking' and sort by votes in ascending order

POST /api/articles.description: Adds a new article and responds with the newly added article.

example.author: butter_bridge
example.title: New Article Title
example.body: This is the body of the new article.

author.description: The username of the article's author.

article_img_url.description: URL of the article's image. Defaults to a placeholder URL if not provided.

response.description: Responds with the newly added article.

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: New Article Title
article.body: This is the body of the new article.

article_id.description: The unique identifier for the article.

author.description: The username of the article's author.

votes.description: The number of votes for the article. Defaults to 0.

created_at.description: The date and time when the article was created.

comment_count.description: The number of comments on the article. Defaults to 0.

errors.description: Bad Request - The request body is missing required fields or has invalid data.
Not Found - The topic or author does not exist.
Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object by its id

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count of an article by article_id

requestBody.inc_votes: an integer that indicates how much the votes property should be updated by

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: deletes an article by its id

204.description: No Content - The article was successfully deleted.

404.description: Not Found - The article does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a given article_id

queries.limit: Limits the number of responses (defaults to 10)
queries.page: Specifies the page at which to start (calculated using limit)

GET /api/users.description: Retrieves a list of all users from the database. Each user object contains the username, name, and avatar URL of the user.

GET /api/users/:username.description: Retrieves a user object by the given username

404.description: User not found for the given username
